appearance.appearance_reset: Reader color scheme and typography reset to default settings.
appearance.font_size_decreased_min: Reader font size decreased to minimum size.
appearance.font_size_increased_max: Reader font size increased to maximum size.
appearance.margin_size_decreased_min: Reader margins decreased to minimum size.
appearance.margin_size_increased_max: Reader margins increased to maximum size.

notes.no_matches_with_filters: No annotations match the filters set above. Adjust the filters to show more results.
notes.no_group_annotations_message: Once someone in the group has highlighted or annotated a passage in this text, it will appear here. To annotate or highlight, select a passage from the text and click the appropriate button on the pop-up menu.
notes.no_annotations_by_me: You haven't annotated this text yet
notes.no_annotations_by_me_message: Once youâ€™ve highlighted or annotated a passage in this text, it will appear here. To annotate or highlight, select a passage from the text and click the appropriate button on the pop-up menu.
notes.no_orphans_message: When a text is edited, Manifold attempts to place annotations in the updated text. If the passage you annotated no longer exists in the text, your annotations will appear here.
notes.unverified_message: To publicly annotate texts you must first verify your email

report_annotation.instructions: Administrators of this instance will be notified.
report_annotation.placeholder: Optionally, include a message about why you are reporting this content.

reader.annotation_highlight_aria_label: Begin highlight and annotation; {{chunk}}; end highlight and annotation.

resource_display.instructions: Please select how you would like this resource to display within your text.

inline.title: Inline
inline.description: A small button appears inline, after the annotated text. Thumbnail previews and titles will appear in the margins (or the footer for narrower screens).

block.title: Block
block.description: A large preview block appears within the flow of the main text, just below the annotated portion. This larger preview includes metadata and controls.
block.selection_warning: *Resource blocks can only be inserted at the end of a block element, such as a paragraph. If you'd like to display this resource as a block, adjust your selection so it extends to the end of a block.
